properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.BOARD_NO = MAIN.BOARD_NO AND DELETE_FL = 'N') COMMENT_COUNT FROM "BOARD" MAIN JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT, CREATE_DT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET DELETE_FL = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ?)

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N'
